description: Welcome to Fleetwood Village - where modern design meets everyday convenience. This Modern 3 bed + 3 bath + den (can be used as 4th bedroom) townhome with 1,405 sq. ft. of open living! Featuring a gourmet kitchen with quartz counters & stainless steel appliances, spacious primary suite with walk-in closet, and a versatile entry-level bedroom with ensuite. A true walk away from Retail Stores, Restaurants, Banks, Groceries Stores, and future Skytrain. OPEN HOUSE SUNDAY SEPT 28, 2-4PM
